channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Smriti Pradhan Site

item.title: My first blogpost
item.description: Through my three years of PhD and two years of active research in the field of coarse-grained molecular dynamics I have had the opportunity to work with different MD engines. Hence I though it might be helpful to blog my experience with each of these softwares used.
